title: The New Phoenix Emoji 🐦‍🔥: Meaning, Release Date, Unicode & More

steps.title: Yes, Apple released the phoenix emoji 🐦‍🔥 as part of Emoji 15.1.
steps.content: Yes, Apple released the phoenix emoji 🐦‍🔥 as part of Emoji 15.1. Approved in September 2023, the 🐦‍🔥 emoji is available on the latest Samsung devices (via One UI 6.0), Google’s Noto Emoji fonts (via Emoji 15.1), and iOS 17.4. [1] X Research source It looks like a majestic bird rising from the ashes, with outstretched wings and red, orange, and yellow coloring. Currently, it has limited support across platforms, so you may not see it as a single emoji design. To get the 🐦‍🔥 emoji, you can either: Combine the bird 🐦 and fire 🔥 emojis with a zero width joiner, creating the ZWJ in HTML with codes &zwj or &#8205 (or U+200D in Unicode). [2] X Research source Copy and paste the 🐦‍🔥 emoji : Highlight the 🐦‍🔥 emoji, right-click the mouse or trackpad, and hit “Copy.” Then, navigate to the space you want to paste the emoji, right-click the mouse or trackpad, and hit “Paste.”

steps.title: The phoenix 🐦‍🔥 emoji symbolizes rebirth and renewal.
steps.content: The phoenix 🐦‍🔥 emoji symbolizes rebirth and renewal. With bright, flame-like feathers, the phoenix is known for dying in a blaze, then rising from the ashes in Greek mythology. This makes it a powerful symbol of hope, new beginnings, and reinventing yourself—especially after enduring a particular struggle. Use the 🐦‍🔥 emoji to say better things are coming your way. [3] X Research source “Ready for a fresh start in the city 🐦‍🔥” “Reborn with every sunrise, just like a phoenix 🐦‍🔥” “2024 was one of the worst years of my life, but it helped me prioritize my relationships and embrace my authentic self. I can’t wait to see what this upcoming year brings 🐦‍🔥”

steps.title: The phoenix 🐦‍🔥 emoji indicates strength and resilience.
steps.content: The phoenix 🐦‍🔥 emoji indicates strength and resilience. The phoenix’s ability to come back from the dead makes it a common symbol of overcoming hardship. Much like the mythical creature, people often find themselves in challenging situations, faced with the choice of succumbing to the flames or emerging victorious on the other side. Use the 🐦‍🔥 emoji to express that you’re strong, resilient, and ready for anything. [4] X Research source “In the flames, I find my strength 🐦‍🔥” “Rising above the chaos, just like a 🐦‍🔥” “Through the fire and flames, I’ll rise again 🐦‍🔥”

steps.title: The phoenix 🐦‍🔥 emoji may represent immortality and life after death.
steps.content: The phoenix 🐦‍🔥 emoji may represent immortality and life after death. Since the phoenix is able to rise from its own ashes, it symbolizes immortality, reincarnation, and one’s existence beyond physical death. In fact, the phoenix is often seen as a symbol of the resurrection of Jesus Christ in Christianity. Use the 🐦‍🔥 emoji to pay tribute to a passed loved one or celebrity you admire. [5] X Research source “Your love, light, and laughter lives on in the stars 🐦‍🔥” “Your spirit transcends all boundaries, even those of life and death 🐦‍🔥” “You are forever cherished, loved, and deeply missed. Please know that your spirit is felt in every beat of my heart 🐦‍🔥”

steps.title: The phoenix 🐦‍🔥 emoji can symbolize nobility and power.
steps.content: The phoenix 🐦‍🔥 emoji can symbolize nobility and power. In Asian culture, the phoenix is a symbol of queens, empresses, and female royalty in general. The Korean presidency features 2 phoenixes in its presidential seal (called the bonghwang), and the Japanese imperial family also uses the phoenix as one of its symbols (called the hōō). Use the 🐦‍🔥 emoji to talk about nobility in Asian countries. [6] X Research source “The 🐦‍🔥 appears on Japan’s stamps and currency.” “In China, the 🐦‍🔥 is a sign of joy, happiness, and heavenly satisfaction.” “Fun fact: The 🐦‍🔥 has been featured on the presidential seal of South Korea since 1967.”

steps.content: Pair the 🐦‍🔥 with other emojis to create a fun and unique message. Spice up a standard text message by adding a couple extra emojis to the mix. Not sure what to send?
